00072 #include "widget.h"
00073 class KrTextWidget;
00074 
00075 
00083 class KrListBox : public KrWidget
00084 {
00085   public:
00086         KrListBox( KrFontResource* font, int width, int height, int scrollWidth, const KrScheme& scheme );
00087         virtual ~KrListBox();
00088 
00090         int NumItems()                                                                  { return textStrings.Count(); }
00092         int SelectedItem()                                                              { return selectedItem; }
00094         int AddTextChar( const std::string& text );
00096         void GetTextChar( int index, std::string* text );
00098         void MoveSelection( int delta );
00099 
00100         virtual bool HandleWidgetEvent( KrWidget* source, 
00101                                                                         U32 event, U32 data, const SDL_Event* sdlEvent,
00102                                                                         const char* command, const char* arg );
00103 
00104         // Used to initialize the widget.
00105         virtual void AddedtoTree();
00106 
00107   private:
00108         void DrawText();
00109 
00110         int width, height;
00111         KrFontResource* font;
00112         KrBevelElement  *outerBevel;
00113 
00114         GlDynArray< KrTextWidget* > textWidgets;
00115         GlDynArray< std::string >   textStrings;
00116 
00117         int firstItem;
00118         int selectedItem;
00119 };
